tool.name: Perform jackknifed UPGMA clustering

regex.match: RuntimeWarning: The result contains negative eigenvalues

tool.command:
jackknifed_beta_diversity.py -i $otu_table_fp -m $mapping_fp -o jackknifed_beta_diversity -e $seqs_per_sample
#if $tree_fp -t $tree_fp #end if
#if $parameter_fp -p $parameter_fp #end if
--master_tree $master_tree
$parallel -O "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}" &&
python $__tool_directory__/jackknifed_beta_diversity_through_plots_html_generation.py --data_directory jackknifed_beta_diversity --html_file $jackknifed_beta_diversity_report --html_dir $jackknifed_beta_diversity_report.files_path

param.name: seqs_per_sample
param.label: Number of sequences to include in each jackknifed subset

param.name: tree_fp
param.label: Tree file (Optional)
param.help: It is required for phylogenetic measures (-t/--tree_fp)

param.name: parameter_fp
param.label: Parameter file (Optional)
param.help: It specifies changes to the default behavior, e.g. beta diversity metrics (-p/--parameter_fp)

param.name: master_tree
param.label: Method for computing master trees in jackknife analysis
param.option: Consensus of trees from jackknifed otu tables
Tree generated from input (unsubsambled) otu table

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool performs jackknifing (repeatedly resampling a subset of the available data from each sample) to measure robustness of individual UPGMA clusters and clusters in PCoA plots.
More information about this tool is available on `QIIME documentation <http://qiime.org/scripts/jackknifed_beta_diversity.html>`_.
